attributes.action: Stop the presses. Put Tom Chittick on the new £5 note immediately.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

You can find out more information on this website:
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/advisorycommittee.aspx
